user.title: 8311 XGS-PON ONU Stick Setup
user.description: Enter the connection details for your ONU stick. SSH keys will be automatically generated and managed. The data update interval determines how often sensor data is fetched from the ONU (minimum 30 seconds, maximum 1 hour - can be changed in 'Options').

data.confirm_key_added: I have added the SSH key to the ONU (required)

init.description: Configure the data update interval for the ONU stick.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the ONU stick. Please check the HASS raw logs and search for 'onu'.
error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Please ensure the SSH key is correctly installed on the ONU.
error.key_generation_failed: Failed to generate SSH key. Please check file permissions and the HASS raw logs, search for 'onu'.
error.ssh_not_available: SSH is not available on the specified host. Please check the ONU IP address and ensure SSH is enabled.

abort.already_configured: This ONU stick is already configured.

reboot_onu_stick.description: Reboot the ONU stick device using SSH

regenerate_ssh_key.name: Regenerate SSH Key
regenerate_ssh_key.description: Generate a new SSH key for the ONU stick (backs up current key)
